name: THINKTANK
membership: Commercial and Industrial Chamber of Athens (www.acci.gr)
goal: Thinktank is a team of legal, regulatory affairs, science and technology and business experts, assisting corporations and NGOs in untangling complex situations where the market access of their products and/or services is impeded by government regulations.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Medical Devices
Biologicals
Biocides
Chemicals/REACH
Electronic Cigarettes and Refill Liquids
Food flavours, additives
Public Procurement
